MASTU_S1_lower_T5_radial_1.description: Outward radial path up lower divertor tile 5 in sector 1

MASTU_S1_lower_T5_radial_2.description: Outward radial path up lower divertor tile 5 in sector 1. Shorter path near edge of tile to avoid deviation from primary wall contour due to TF ripple.

MASTU_S3_lower_T2_radial_1.description: Outward radial path down lower divertor tile 2 in sector 3.

MASTU_S3_lower_T2_radial_2.description: Outward radial path down lower divertor tile 2 in sector 3. Probably starts out of view.

MASTU_S3_lower_T2T3_radial_1.description: Outward radial path down lower divertor tiles 2-3 in sector 3. Spans loose LP cable.
